main event: A civilian reported a bright light in Xenia, Ohio on May 6, 1958, observed hovering over a cornfield.
interesting points: The object appeared to be oval in shape and changed colors from red to blue to yellow., The sighting lasted approximately 45 minutes., The witness was accompanied by her son who also observed the object., The object periodically disappeared and reappeared during the observation., The sighting was acknowledged by the Air Technical Intelligence Center of the U.S. Air Force.
